can someone please give me a step by step on how to install this game and make it run. i am new and it keeps giving me an error report when i run it.
Is this the game, including the patch? or is it just the patch? please answere quickly. and when i got it down, how do i install it?

Ok. This is Pro Evo 6 with a patch that makes the kits etc look a whole lot better. You must find the folder 'kitserver' in the patch folder. Copy this across to the Konami pro evo 6 folder. Then in the kitserver folder find an exe file 'setup'. Double click and it will ask you wether you wnat the kitserver patch installed. Press yes and go back to pro evo 6. start it up and the new kits etc will be there. Still keep your save games etc too.
